dhp273-289:273: Maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko seṭṭho,saccānaṁ caturo padā;Virāgo seṭṭho dhammānaṁ,dvipadānañca cakkhumā.
dhp273-289:274: Eseva maggo natthañño,Dassanassa visuddhiyā;Etañhi tumhe paṭipajjatha,Mārassetaṁ pamohanaṁ.
dhp273-289:275: Etañhi tumhe paṭipannā,dukkhassantaṁ karissatha;Akkhāto vo mayā maggo,aññāya sallakantanaṁ.
dhp273-289:277: "Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā"ti,yadā paññāya passati;Atha nibbindati dukkhe,esa maggo visuddhiyā.
dhp273-289:278: "Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā"ti,yadā paññāya passati;Atha nibbindati dukkhe,esa maggo visuddhiyā.
dhp273-289:279: "Sabbe dhammā anattā"ti,yadā paññāya passati;Atha nibbindati dukkhe,esa maggo visuddhiyā.
dhp273-289:280: Uṭṭhānakālamhi anuṭṭhahāno,Yuvā balī ālasiyaṁ upeto;Saṁsannasaṅkappamano kusīto,Paññāya maggaṁ alaso na vindati.
dhp273-289:281: Vācānurakkhī manasā susaṁvuto,Kāyena ca nākusalaṁ kayirā;Ete tayo kammapathe visodhaye,Ārādhaye maggamisippaveditaṁ.
dhp273-289:282: Yogā ve jāyatī bhūri,ayogā bhūrisaṅkhayo;Etaṁ dvedhāpathaṁ ñatvā,bhavāya vibhavāya ca;Tathāttānaṁ niveseyya,yathā bhūri pavaḍḍhati.
dhp273-289:283: Vanaṁ chindatha mā rukkhaṁ,vanato jāyate bhayaṁ;Chetvā vanañca vanathañca,nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo.
dhp273-289:284: Yāva hi vanatho na chijjati,Aṇumattopi narassa nārisu;Paṭibaddhamanova tāva so,Vaccho khīrapakova mātari.
dhp273-289:285: Ucchinda sinehamattano,Kumudaṁ sāradikaṁva pāṇinā;Santimaggameva brūhaya,Nibbānaṁ sugatena desitaṁ.
dhp273-289:286: Idha vassaṁ vasissāmi,idha hemantagimhisu;Iti bālo vicinteti,antarāyaṁ na bujjhati.
dhp273-289:287: Taṁ puttapasusammattaṁ,byāsattamanasaṁ naraṁ;Suttaṁ gāmaṁ mahoghova,maccu ādāya gacchati.
dhp273-289:288: Na santi puttā tāṇāya,na pitā nāpi bandhavā;Antakenādhipannassa,natthi ñātīsu tāṇatā.
